languages.text: "Одна из моих фрейлин, Амелия. Амелия выполняет обязанности секретаря и позволяет мне поддерживать постоянную связь с приближенными семьями — теми, от кого больше других зависит эффективность и процветание Януса. Я полностью доверяю своим советникам, и со временем Амелия стала не просто моей доверенной компаньонкой, но и буквально тенью! Без нее я как без рук!" {n}Вистенца смеется и ободряюще кивает девушке.{/n}

"One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Одна из моих фрейлин, Амелия. Амелия выполняет обязанности секретаря и позволяет мне поддерживать постоянную связь с приближенными семьями — теми, от кого больше других зависит эффективность и процветание Януса. Я полностью доверяю своим советникам, и со временем Амелия стала не просто моей доверенной компаньонкой, но и буквально тенью! Без нее я как без рук!" {n}Вистенца смеется и ободряюще кивает девушке.{/n}

Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

languages.text: “是我的女官阿梅莉亚。她负责履行秘书的职责，帮助我与加努斯的生产繁荣最为密切相关的那些家族保持联系。我非常信任我的顾问。这么多年过去了，阿梅莉亚不仅仅是我忠实的伙伴，而且几乎就像我的影子一样！若是失去了她，恐怕就等于失去了左右手！”{n}维丝坦萨笑了起来，朝阿梅莉亚鼓励般地点点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是我的女官阿梅莉亚。她负责履行秘书的职责，帮助我与加努斯的生产繁荣最为密切相关的那些家族保持联系。我非常信任我的顾问。这么多年过去了，阿梅莉亚不仅仅是我忠实的伙伴，而且几乎就像我的影子一样！若是失去了她，恐怕就等于失去了左右手！”{n}维丝坦萨笑了起来，朝阿梅莉亚鼓励般地点点头。{/n}

languages.text: «Una de mis doncellas, Amelia. Ejerce funciones de secretariado y me ayuda a mantener el contacto con las principales familias responsables de la producción y la prosperidad de Janus. Confío plenamente en mis asesores y, con el tiempo, ¡Amelia ha pasado de ser una simple acompañante a ser prácticamente mi sombra! ¡Perderla sería como perder mi mano derecha!». {n}Vistenza se ríe y asiente, animando a Amelia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Una de mis doncellas, Amelia. Ejerce funciones de secretariado y me ayuda a mantener el contacto con las principales familias responsables de la producción y la prosperidad de Janus. Confío plenamente en mis asesores y, con el tiempo, ¡Amelia ha pasado de ser una simple acompañante a ser prácticamente mi sombra! ¡Perderla sería como perder mi mano derecha!». {n}Vistenza se ríe y asiente, animando a Amelia.{/n}

languages.text: 「侍女の一人、アメリアです。アメリアは秘書業務を担い、ヤヌスの生産性と繁栄に対して最も責任がある家々と継続的に交流を持てるよう、取り計らってくれています。私は相談役たちを暗黙のうちに信頼していますが、時が経つにつれ、アメリアは忠実な友人というだけでなく私の影同然になったのです！」{n}ヴィステンツァは声を出して笑うとアメリアに向かって励ますようにうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「侍女の一人、アメリアです。アメリアは秘書業務を担い、ヤヌスの生産性と繁栄に対して最も責任がある家々と継続的に交流を持てるよう、取り計らってくれています。私は相談役たちを暗黙のうちに信頼していますが、時が経つにつれ、アメリアは忠実な友人というだけでなく私の影同然になったのです！」{n}ヴィステンツァは声を出して笑うとアメリアに向かって励ますようにうなずく。{/n}

languages.text: "Eine meiner Hofdamen, Amelia. Amelia unterstützt mich dabei, ständigen Kontakt mit jenen Familien zu halten, die an der Produktivität und dem Wohlstand von Janus den größten Anteil haben. Ich vertraue meinen Beratern, und mit der Zeit ist Amelia nicht nur eine treue Gefährtin, sondern fast so etwas wie mein Schatten geworden! Sie zu verlieren, würde dem Verlust meiner rechten Hand gleichkommen!" {n}Vistenza lacht und nickt Amelia aufmunternd zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eine meiner Hofdamen, Amelia. Amelia unterstützt mich dabei, ständigen Kontakt mit jenen Familien zu halten, die an der Produktivität und dem Wohlstand von Janus den größten Anteil haben. Ich vertraue meinen Beratern, und mit der Zeit ist Amelia nicht nur eine treue Gefährtin, sondern fast so etwas wie mein Schatten geworden! Sie zu verlieren, würde dem Verlust meiner rechten Hand gleichkommen!" {n}Vistenza lacht und nickt Amelia aufmunternd zu.{/n}

languages.text: « L'une de mes dames d'honneur, Amélia. Elle remplit des fonctions de secrétaire et m'aide à rester en contact avec les principales familles responsables de la productivité et de la prospérité de Janus. J'accorde une confiance implicite à mes conseillers et considère Amélia comme une fidèle compagne qui est devenue comme mon ombre avec le temps ! Sans elle, j'aurais l'impression de perdre une partie de moi ! » {n}Vistenza rit et encourage Amélia d'un hochement de tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'une de mes dames d'honneur, Amélia. Elle remplit des fonctions de secrétaire et m'aide à rester en contact avec les principales familles responsables de la productivité et de la prospérité de Janus. J'accorde une confiance implicite à mes conseillers et considère Amélia comme une fidèle compagne qui est devenue comme mon ombre avec le temps ! Sans elle, j'aurais l'impression de perdre une partie de moi ! » {n}Vistenza rit et encourage Amélia d'un hochement de tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Nedimelerimden Amelia. Amelia, yazmanlık işlerini yürütür ve Janus'un üretkenliği ile refahı üzerinde en çok emeği olan ailelerle sürekli olarak iletişimde kalmama yardımcı olur. Danışmanlarıma gözüm kapalı güvenirim. Amelia da zamanla yalnızca sadık bir refakatçi değil, âdeta gölgem gibi oldu! Onu kaybetmek benim için sağ elimi kaybetmekten farksız olur!" {n}Vistenza gülüyor ve yüreklendirircesine Amelia'ya başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "One of my ladies-in-waiting, Amelia. Amelia performs secretarial duties and helps me to remain in constant contact with those families who are most responsible for the productivity and prosperity of Janus. I trust my advisors implicitly, and over time Amelia has become not merely a faithful companion, but almost my shadow! Losing her would be like losing my right hand!" {n}Vistenza laughs and gives Amelia an encouraging nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nedimelerimden Amelia. Amelia, yazmanlık işlerini yürütür ve Janus'un üretkenliği ile refahın üzerinde en çok emeği olan ailelerle sürekli olarak iletişimde kalmama yardımcı olur. Danışmanlarıma gözüm kapalı güvenirim. Amelia da zamanla yalnızca sadık bir refakatçi değil, âdeta gölgem gibi oldu! Onu kaybetmektense sağ elimi kaybetmeyi yeğlerim!" {n}Vistenza gülüyor ve yüreklendirircesine Amelia'ya başını sallıyor.{/n}
